PandaControllerManager.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 from controller_manager_msgs.srv import SwitchController, ListControllers
3 import rospy
4 from enum import Enum
5 
6 
7 class ControllerType(Enum):
8  POSITION = 1
9  VELOCITY = 2
10  TRAJECTORY = 3
11 
12 
13 class PandaControllerManager():
14  def __init__(self):
15  """
16  Creates the PandaControllerManager object and
17  determines the correct mode to be in - position,
18  velocity, or trajectory.
19  """
20  self.controller_service_name = "/controller_manager/switch_controller"
21  velocity_controller_names = ["panda_joint{}_velocity_controller".format(i) for i in range(1,8)]
22  position_controller_names = ["panda_joint{}_position_controller".format(i) for i in range(1,8)]
23  self.controller_names = {
24  ControllerType.POSITION: position_controller_names,
25  ControllerType.VELOCITY: velocity_controller_names,
26  ControllerType.TRAJECTORY: ["panda_joint_trajectory_controller"]
27  }
28  try:
29  list_controllers = rospy.ServiceProxy("/controller_manager/list_controllers", ListControllers)
30  controller_list = list_controllers().controller
31  self.mode = ControllerType.TRAJECTORY
32  for controller in controller_list:
33  if controller.state == "running":
34  if controller.name in position_controller_names:
35  self.mode = ControllerType.POSITION
36  elif controller.name in velocity_controller_names:
37  self.mode = ControllerType.VELOCITY
38  elif controller.name == "panda_joint_trajectory_controller":
39  self.mode = ControllerType.TRAJECTORY
40  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
41  print("Controller Manager Service exception", e)
42 
43  def switch_mode(self, desired_mode):
44  """
45  Based on mode type desired by user, switch controllers from current one.
46 
47  Desired mode should be a ControllerType enum
48  """
49  # check if mode is running
50 
51  if desired_mode == self.mode:
52  print("Desired controller already running.")
53  else:
54  rospy.wait_for_service(self.controller_service_name)
55 
56  try:
57  switch_controller = rospy.ServiceProxy(self.controller_service_name, SwitchController)
58  # switch the controllers
59  switch_controller(self.controller_names[desired_mode],
60  self.controller_names[self.mode], 2, True, 10)
61  print("Mode successfully changed!")
62  self.mode = desired_mode
63  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
64  print("Controller Manager Service exception", e)
65 
66 
67 if __name__ == "__main__":
68  pcm = PandaControllerManager()
69  # switches the mode to velocity. Will do nothing if already in velocity mode.
70  pcm.switch_mode(ControllerType.VELOCITY)
